oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Tintype of Confederate veteran John L. Morgan
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: A tintype of Sgt. John L. Morgan Co. B, 29th Tenn. Inf. Regt., CSA. He is photographed wearing a United Confederate Veterans medal and holding a family Bible. Union troops captured Morgan while on furlough in February 1864 in Murray County, Georgia. He was held at Fort Delaware, Delaware. John L. Morgan was the owner of the items featured in monr011, monr012, and monr013.
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: Morgan, John L.
